sentences.sContent: People laugh not only from pleasure or affection, but also at the discomfiture of someone else.
sentences.sContent_eng: People laugh not only from pleasure or affection, but also at the discomfiture of someone else.
sentences.sCn: 人们不仅因为愉悦和喜爱而笑，也会在他人造成挫折或尴尬的局面时而笑。

words.tran: 挫败；扰乱，破坏；使…为难；使…破灭

trans.tranCn: 挫折, 失败,崩溃,尴尬
